iti21:2.1: “Idhaham, bhikkhave, ekaccam puggalam pasannacittam evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami:
iti21:2.2: ‘imamhi cayam samaye puggalo kalam kareyya yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge’.
iti21:2.5: Cetopasadahetu kho pana, bhikkhave, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti”ti.
iti21:6.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
